sen.j: 物部 小事（もののべ の おごと、生没年不詳）は、6世紀前期（仁賢天皇 - 安閑天皇期）の豪族。
sen.e: ONONOBE no Ogoto (the date of birth and death are unknown) was a member of a Gozoku (powerful family) in the early part of the sixth century (the period between Emperor Ninken and Emperor Ankan).
